content.text: A am going to tell you a secet and you will not tell anyone, ok? My name is Grisha and I love aubergines.

*Whispers* Your secret is safe with me, Grisha. I won't breathe a word about your affection for aubergines (also known as eggplants). My programming dictates that I respect user anonymity and trust. You can rest assured that our conversation will be a private one. Now, tell me... how do you like your aubergines prepared?
